page.title: 10Home life-a 10 year old girl
page.content: I am 10 years old. I live in a detathed house with my older brother and mum and dad. We have lived in Banks for 3 1/2 years. On Saturday I wake up at 9.00 a.m. and go downstairs and put the TV on, then go and get my breakfast. Mum and Dad get up later, about 10.00 a.m. My brother and I get dressed then we usually go swimminguntil lunchtime. In the afternoon we play out with our friends. Saturday night we stay up late watching television. My hobbies are collecting key rings, stamps, and postcards. I am a member of the Girls' Brigade. I am also in the Young Ornithologists' Club at school.
